entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing late in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low plus 2.
